node.name: Bom
node.rich_text:
Browser Object Model(Bom)
1.Screen -> it is used to manipulate in window screen 2.Location -> it is used to get host url, protocol etc... 3.History -> it is used to forward, backward etc... 4.Navigator -> it is used to application related like appname, cookie, vendor so much information and also it is mainly we can reserch in hacking.
